name: Pyro Pioneers- game jam 24h
description:
Burn the other caveman! 1v1 intense action game.
How to Play:

Player 1: WASD to move and Space to attack

Player 2: Arrow keys to move and Return to attack

Goal: Pick up weeds from the ground and burn your enemy. Careful! Weeds catch fire fast so don't stand when a patch of weeds starts catching fire.
